column4: sorry, no experience with freenet, i see there isn't a current freenet ubuntu package: http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&q=freenet+ubuntu&btnG=Search
- thanks... I've been running into silly java installation problems with it... cant find any online answers either
do you have java6 installed?  and add this to the top of the /etc/jvm file: /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun
I've got java6... will add as suggested.. thanks meanwhile
